document.heading: Trash Compactor Tax Incentive Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-223, the “Trash Compactor Tax Incentive Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-81. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 23, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-538 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-223 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-223: Section 301(b) of D.C. Law 20-223 provided (1) that §§ 201-203 of the act shall apply for the tax year in which its fiscal effect has been included in an approved budget and financial plan; (2) that the Chief Financial Officer shall certify the date of the inclusion of the fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan, and provide notice to the Budget Director of the Council of the certification; and (3) that the Budget Director shall cause the notice of the certification to be published in the District of Columbia Register and that the date of publication of the notice of the certification shall not affect the applicability of §§ 201-203.

section.heading: Commercial trash compactor acquisition grant program.
